SELFBOT_CLIENTID.description: Discord Client Id. Get it here: https://discordapp.com/developers/applications/

BOT_TOKEN.description: Discord BOT token. Get it here: https://discordapp.com/developers/applications/

PREFIX.description: Owners Id, to assign more than one use comma(,) to separate. Instructions how to get this: https://nadekobot.readthedocs.io/en/latest/JSON%20Explanations/

dbotsToken.description: LoL Api Key. Instructions how to get this: https://nadekobot.readthedocs.io/en/latest/JSON%20Explanations/

dbotsToken2.description: Google Api Key. Instructions how to get this: https://nadekobot.readthedocs.io/en/latest/JSON%20Explanations/

OWNERID.description: Mashape Key. Instructions how to get this: https://nadekobot.readthedocs.io/en/latest/JSON%20Explanations/
